modes.description: This game mode is for those who want to have a good time, defeat their greatest enemies one after another to win the title of world champion, the most courageous fighter of all time.
FIGHT FACE TO FACE WITH YOUR HIGEST RIVAL, CRUSH HIM AND MAKE BITE THE DUST OF YOUR FIST, SHOW HIM HOW BLUE STEEL FEEL.
GET BETTER AND BETTER, IMPROVE YOUR MOVES, BECOME INTO THE HIGEST FIGHTER OF ALL TIMES TO WIN A WORLD CUP. TIME AND PRACTICE MAKE MASTERS.
LOGIN AND GET YOU INTO WORLD WIDE SCORE CHART.
SIGNIN FOR AN ACCOUNT AND GET YOU INTO WORLD WIDE SCORE CHART
